name: MEDIC! (Axolotl_Trop_Kawai, JulienAb, Antirion, Stephane Murca, Artyu, ayouub, Marc-Amaury Fauris, Maxime Britto, labelettexX)
name_original: MEDIC! (Axolotl_Trop_Kawai, JulienAb, Antirion, Stephane Murca, Artyu, ayouub, Marc-Amaury Fauris, Maxime Britto, labelettexX)
description:
MEDIC! is a puzzle mobile game.
You play as a war doctor sent to the front to save his soldiers stuck in a dilapidated hospital. Bypass enemy soldiers while collecting medicine to heal your allies and climb to the next floor. However, as you advance, you will encounter various obstacles that will prevent you from reaching your goal.

You play a war doctor who has to save his allied soldiers with the help of medicines scattered in each floor.
Each time the player moves a square, an action is triggered on the map.
When there are enemies on the floor, they move right after the player and each have a different pattern.
You have to collect the medicines and heal the soldiers while avoiding the enemies before reaching the stairs that take you to the next floor.

Game Programming

ABERTON Julien

BRITTO Maxime

DIRION Antoine

PEJOINE Arthur

Game Design
